related_post.text: Well it would be an interesting challenge to create a Python script that modifies its own source file.

so_post.text: Looks like you can do it directly <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39643428/howcanimakeapythonscriptchangeitself> but this might depend on copyonwrite support in the operating system

comments: not really a question, but they do describe the task they want to accomplish and find a source that could help
